columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the instance fleet.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The identifier of the instance fleet.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the instance fleet.

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the cluster.

columns.name: instance_fleet_type
columns.description: The type of the instance fleet. Valid values are MASTER, CORE or TASK.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the instance fleet.

columns.name: provisioned_on_demand_capacity
columns.description: The number of On-Demand units that have been provisioned for the instance fleet to fulfill TargetOnDemandCapacity.

columns.name: provisioned_spot_capacity
columns.description: The number of Spot units that have been provisioned for this instance fleet to fulfill TargetSpotCapacity.

columns.name: target_on_demand_capacity
columns.description: The target capacity of On-Demand units for the instance fleet, which determines how many On-Demand Instances to provision.

columns.name: target_spot_capacity
columns.description: The target capacity of Spot units for the instance fleet, which determines how many Spot Instances to provision.

columns.name: instance_type_specifications
columns.description: An array of specifications for the instance types that comprise an instance fleet.

columns.name: launch_specifications
columns.description: Describes the launch specification for an instance fleet.

columns.name: state_change_reason
columns.description: Provides status change reason details for the instance fleet.

columns.name: status_timeline
columns.description: Provides historical timestamps for the instance fleet, including the time of creation, the time it became ready to run jobs, and the time of termination.
